# Total Leak Detection

> Professional water leak detection, sewer camera inspection, and mold testing services in Miami, Florida.

Total Leak Detection provides expert leak detection technicians who work with all insurance companies. We offer fast plumbing reports with a 48-hour guarantee and are fully licensed (CFC1430460) and insured. BBB Accredited.

## Services

- [Water Leak Detection](https://totalleakdetection.com/services/water-leak-detection/): Non-invasive leak detection for residential and commercial properties
- [Sewer Camera Inspection](https://totalleakdetection.com/sewer-camera-inspection/): Video inspection of sewer and drain lines
- [Mold Testing](https://totalleakdetection.com/services/mold-testing/): Professional mold inspection and testing services
- [Hydro Jetting](https://totalleakdetection.com/services/hydro-jetting/): High-pressure drain and sewer line cleaning
- [Slab Leak Detection](https://totalleakdetection.com/services/slab-leak-detection/): Detection of leaks under concrete foundations
- [Plumbing Reports](https://totalleakdetection.com/services/plumbing-report-writing/): Detailed reports for insurance claims
